title: Struwwelpeter
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Fast food, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The Struwwelpeter is a youth center with a cafe and games. Offers fair trade coffee and tea, soy milk, fast finger food with several vegetarian choices and 2 vegan ones (spring rolls and a hot-dog). Twice a month a vegan group similar to Food Not Bombs cooks here (facebook.com/VokueKronach), and the proceeds from those meals go to animal liberation organizations.
